text: Death called to a Wretched man every day to his help. How beautiful you are, lady, I said to her, come soon to finish my sad fate. She thought that going to serve her, knocked on the door, and came in, and approached, and cried out looking at her poor man: Don't get near, oh monster! Get out of here! Mecenas, a man of great stature, said in one place, "I am content to be lame and lame, yet I am still alive, and I will be content". Never come, O Death, with fear I say so again. FIN
title: La muerte y el desventurado
author: Jean de La Fontaine
